mapper.select: select DISTINCT client_id,fund_account_id,trade_account_id from T_DONE where encrypt_lable = 0
select count(*) from T_DONE where busi_date = DATE_FORMAT((CURDATE() - interval 1 day),"%Y%m%d")
mapper.update: UPDATE T_DONE A INNER JOIN TDONE_encrypt_temp B ON A.fund_account_id=B.TDONE_B_fundaccountId and A.trade_account_id = B.TDONE_B_tradeaccountId and A.client_id = B.TDONE_B_clientId SET A.fund_account_id=B.TDONE_A_fundaccountId, A.trade_account_id=B.TDONE_A_tradeaccountId, A.client_id=B.TDONE_A_clientId, A.encrypt_lable=1 WHERE A.id IN (SELECT id FROM (SELECT id FROM T_DONE where id BETWEEN #{id1} and #{id2}) AS temp)

UPDATE T_DONE A inner join TDONE_encrypt_temp B ON A.fund_account_id = B.TDONE_B_fundaccountId and A.trade_account_id = B.TDONE_B_tradeaccountId and A.client_id=B.TDONE_B_clientId SET A.fund_account_id=B.TDONE_A_fundaccountId,A.trade_account_id=B.TDONE_A_tradeaccountId,A.client_id=B.TDONE_A_clientId,A.encrypt_lable=1 where A.id in (select id from (select id from T_DONE where encrypt_lable=0) AS temp)
